title: Looking for Jack Barry, Matty McIntyre, and Danny Hoffman prewar especially t205
author: Joshchisox08

posts.post_title: Looking for Jack Barry, Matty McIntyre, and Danny Hoffman prewar especially t205
posts.post_content:
Looking for virtually anything pre-war but I'll start with T205s

Jack Barry
Matty McIntyre
Danny Hoffman

Looking for PSA or SGC only. Looking to spend 20-50 per card. Obviously the cheaper the better with me. 

The reason for these players in particular are they're form CT.
